name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David A. JOHNSON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David A. JOHNSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The judgments of sentence are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Allen N. Abrams, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Alan J. Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
436 A.2d 627
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David A. JOHNSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 19, 1981.
Decided Nov. 5, 1981.
Allen N. Abrams, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Alan J. Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
